Reviews.Title: GeoVision camera
Reviews.Author: Marc Kogge
Reviews.Content: I don't usually write reviews, but I thought this product was worthy.  I had a few issues setting up the camera, but found the technical support to be excellent.  They are in Taiwan, so it takes about 24 hours to get a response, but they are very helpful.  So far, so good.  For the price, this appears to be a very good camera.  I anticipate purchasing more of these, and expect the installation will go more smoothly now that I know what to do.

Reviews.Title: Quick delivery and good quality product!
Reviews.Author: Ronald A. Bueno
Reviews.Content: I have purchased GeoVision products in the past and found them to be very reliable. So far no issues with the purchase and product arrived as expected.

ProductInfo.Name: GV-MFD130 | 1.3MP, H.264, Mini Fixed IP Dome
